name: teamcity-dashboard-widgets
title: Teamcity Dashboard Widgets
description: A set of dashboard widgets that provide various views of TeamCity configurations. The set includes widgets for viewing build configuration statuses, build artifacts, and assigned investigations from TeamCity.

widgets.name: Build Artifacts
widgets.description: Displays a list of artifacts available for download from a specific build configuration in TeamCity.

widgets.name: Investigations
widgets.description: Displays a list of assigned investigations for failed builds in TeamCity.

widgets.name: Project Status
widgets.description: Displays the status of build configurations that belong to a project in TeamCity.
